testcase.name: Performance testing
testcase.system-out: Given I open the URL "https://leumit.co.il/"................................passed Then The page title should contain "לאומית".................................passed And The page should load in less than "10000" milliseconds..................passed

testcase.name: Page title verification
testcase.system-out: Given I open the URL "https://leumit.co.il/"................................passed Then The page title should contain "לאומית".................................passed And I close the browser.....................................................passed Then Assert browser is closed...............................................passed

testcase.name: Login fields should be visible
testcase.system-out: Given I open the URL "https://www.leumit.co.il/"............................passed Then The identification field "input[name='IdNumTextBox']" should be visible.passed And The password field "input[name='PasswordTextBox']" should be visible....passed

testcase.name: Logo should be visible
testcase.system-out: Given I open the URL "https://leumit.co.il/"................................passed Then The logo at "img" should be visible....................................passed

testcase.name: Navigate to home page
testcase.system-out: Given I open the URL "https://leumit.co.il/"................................passed Then The page title should contain "לאומית".................................passed
